VI_STATUS_REG       = 0xA4400000;
VI_DRAM_ADDR_REG    = 0xA4400004;
VI_WIDTH_REG        = 0xA4400008;
VI_CURRENT_REG      = 0xA4400010;
VI_BURST_REG        = 0xA4400014;
